verbs.description: [ARG0: russian orthodox church] [V: breaks] [ARG1: ties with orthodoxy leader moscow] ap — the russian orthodox church decided monday to sever ties with the leader of the worldwide orthodox community after his decision to grant ukrainian clerics independence from the moscow patriarchate metropolitan hilarion said the russian church holy synod resolved to ' break the eucharistic communion with the istanbul - based ecumenical patriarchate of constantinople under the leadership of ecumenical patriarch bartholomew i the patriarchate last week removed its condemnation of leaders of schismatic orthodox churches in ukraine the decision marked a step toward establishing an ecclesiastically independent istanbul based ecumenical patriarchate of constantinople the russian orthodox church moscow ukrainian orthodox church archbishop yevstratiy istanbul - based ecumenical patriarchate russian orthodox church ukraine orthodox church in ukraine istanbul - based ecumenical patriarchate of constantinople russian churchs holy synod church holy synod moscow patriarchate crimean peninsula russian church holy synod hilarion orthodox church
